about_the_game:
How can a slime change the world around it? In this incredible cozy game, experience the relaxing journey of cleaning with acids, automatic repairs, and a unique story!

Slime the Cleaner is a simple game where your goal is to relax and clean everything around you.

How to clean?



Clean and repair everything around you! Meet the best cleaner in the world: Slime. With various acids available, you can change your own chemistry and appearance to clean even the toughest stains. And if that's not enough, we also have upgrades to choose from!

Talk to everyone! Skeletons, golems, giant rats, and much more—all needing your services, each with a story to tell. Will you be able to help them all?

Explore a world full of castles, dungeons, hideouts, and more! All in need of immediate cleaning. Watch everything transform with each step you take.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Come visit our Kickstarter Page!


Help contribute to our campaign and get the game for $2 now!
